content: make this cute small amanita mushroom skill level easy size approx 2 5 cm the size will be determined by the type of yarn size hook and your personal gauge materials you can use any yarn that is comfortable and suitable for you *yarn e g fine 2 sport *i used yarn 1 76 oz/174 yds 160 m/50 g jeans by yarn art 55% cotton 45% pac white red *crochet hook 2 mm or according to the yarn you use *scissors *yarn needle the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology instructions are easy to follow if you are familiar with basic crochet techniques all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any way and sell it as your own happy crocheting
